title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui:Nawazuddin Siddiqui Wins Golden Dragon Award For Excellence In Cinema At Cardiff International Film Festival
text:
Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s journey in Bollywood has been nothing short of inspiring. From years of struggle to blink-and-miss roles in films like Munna Bhai MBBS to now becoming one of the most sought after actors, Nawazuddin is one of the most loved stars of the nation.

orissapost.com

For his excellence in cinema, he was recently honoured with the Golden Dragon Award at Cardiff International Film Festival.

mohitbhatia.in

Nawazuddin was high on happiness. Ecstatic about his win, he took to social media to share pictures from the prestigious film festival, wherein Hollywood legend Dame Judi Dench also received the Lifetime Achievement award.

Twitter

"Congratulations #DameJudiDench on receiving the Lifetime Achievement award. Thank You Mr. @MickAntoniw1 the Counsel General of Wales, UK & Cardiff International Film Festival for bestowing me with the prestigious Golden Dragon Award,” he wrote.

Congratulations #DameJudiDench on receiving the Lifetime Achievement award, Thank You Mr. @MickAntoniw1 the Counsel General of Wales,UK & "Cardiff International Film Festival" for bestowing me with the prestigious Golden Dragon Award. pic.twitter.com/lYGxpiKYPz — Nawazuddin Siddiqui (@Nawazuddin_S) October 29, 2019

Don't Miss 224 SHARES 38.6 K SHARES 47.8 K SHARES 21 K SHARES 8.1 K SHARES

Nawazuddin Siddiqui was presented the award by counsel general of Wales, UK, Mick Antoniw, on Sunday at an event in Cardiff.

Indian Express

Nawazuddin Siddiqui has been winning praises for Sacred Games and Ritesh Batra's Photograph and BBC UK's McMafia. Meanwhile, he is also awaiting the release of Motichoor Chaknachoor, a wedding comedy which is slated to hit the theatres on Nov 15.
description: Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s journey in Bollywood has been nothing short of inspiring. From years of struggle to blink-and-miss roles in films like Munna Bhai MBBS to now becoming one of the most sought after actors, Nawazuddin is one of the most loved stars of the nation. For his excellence in cinema, he was recently honoured with the Golden Dragon Award at Cardiff International Film Festival.
